title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home planet.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: Gandhi
production_studio: International Film Investors, Goldcrest Films International
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

title: Tootsie
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Michael Dorsey, a talented but difficult actor, struggles to find work until one desperate attempt for a female role lands him the part of a lifetime.

title: The Thing
description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: Poltergeist
description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

title: An Officer and a Gentleman
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using his son's life-generating device, the Genesis Device, as the ultimate weapon.

title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

title: The Verdict
description: A down-on-his-luck lawyer sees a chance to redeem himself when he takes on a medical malpractice case.

title: Sophie's Choice
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The story of a Polish immigrant who is a survivor of the Holocaust and her tumultuous relationship with a brilliant but unstable American intellectual.

title: First Blood
description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

title: Rocky III
description: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky Balboa is enjoying his life. That is, until he is defeated by a brutal challenger and must regain his fighting spirit.

title: Fanny and Alexander
description: The story of a wealthy Swedish family in the early 20th century, as seen through the eyes of two young children.

title: Conan the Barbarian
production_studio: Universal Pictures, Dino De Laurentiis Company
description: A young barbarian warrior sets off to get revenge on the evil warlord who murdered his parents.

title: The Dark Crystal
description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

title: Diner
description: A group of college-age friends in 1950s Baltimore struggle with their transition to adulthood.

title: Pink Floyd – The Wall
description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation.

title: Victor/Victoria
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score
description: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

title: 48 Hrs.
description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to catch a killer.

title: The World According to Garp
description: The story of a young writer's life and his relationships with his eccentric family.

title: Missing
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The true story of an American journalist who disappeared in Chile during the 1973 military coup.

title: Fitzcarraldo
description: A would-be rubber baron in Peru is determined to transport a steamship over a mountain in order to access a rich rubber territory.

title: The Year of Living Dangerously
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A young Australian reporter travels to Indonesia to cover the political turmoil of the 1960s.

title: Tron
description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

title: Creepshow
description: An anthology of five short, horrific tales inspired by the E.C. comics of the 1950s.

title: My Favorite Year
description: A young comedy writer is assigned to be the caretaker of a flamboyant, alcoholic movie star who is a guest on a live television show.

title: The Secret of NIMH
description: A widowed mouse must move her family to a new home before the farmer's plow destroys their current one, and she gets help from a colony of intelligent rats.

title: Annie
description: A plucky orphan's life is changed forever when she is adopted by a billionaire.

title: The Last Unicorn
description: A unicorn leaves her enchanted forest to find out what happened to the rest of her kind.

title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
description: A Texas sheriff and a brothel madam team up to stop a crusading television reporter from shutting down the local brothel.

title: Friday the 13th Part III
description: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
description: A doctor and the daughter of a murder victim uncover a plot by a toy maker to kill millions of children on Halloween.

title: The Beastmaster
description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

title: Tenebrae
description: An American writer in Rome is stalked by a serial killer who is inspired by his novels.

title: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
description: A private eye's case is solved by interacting with classic movie clips.

title: Cat People
description: A young woman's sexual awakening is complicated by the fact that she is descended from a race of people who turn into panthers when they make love.

title: Koyaanisqatsi
description: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on the relationship between humanity, nature, and technology.

title: The Draughtsman's Contract
description: In 17th-century England, a draughtsman is hired by a wealthy woman to make a series of drawings of her husband's estate, but he becomes entangled in a web of sexual intrigue and murder.

title: Querelle
description: A handsome, amoral sailor in a French port town becomes a prostitute and a murderer.

title: The Night of the Shooting Stars
description: In the last days of World War II, a group of Italian villagers flee their town to escape the retreating German army.

title: Yol
description: The story of several Turkish prisoners who are given a week's leave to visit their families.

title: Eating Raoul
description: A stuffy, square couple in Los Angeles come up with a bizarre way to solve their financial problems.

title: Deathtrap
description: A once-successful playwright who is desperate for a new hit receives a manuscript from a former student and plots to kill him and steal the play.

title: Class of 1984
description: An idealistic teacher in a violent, inner-city high school finds himself in a deadly confrontation with a gang of ruthless students.
